item.title: My favorite product coming out of the pandemic
item.description: I got introduced to several products during what I call ’the zoom pandemic.’ Quite a lot of them were related to dogs. All thanks to Mocha - our 7 month old aussie (as of this writing). One product which turned out to be a showstopper for me was Masterclass. I love how Masterclass makes it easy for me to access knowledge directly from top experts in various fields. It feels like on-demand tutoring from all-star tutors!
